name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 417 Solar Inverter Startup Under Energy Constraints
description:
This NFT represents Proof 417 from MaMeeFarm™, recorded on 2025-12-31
under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

The record documents the moment of powering on a hybrid solar inverter
connected to photovoltaic panels for household electricity use.
The inverter had been intentionally shut down at 23:00 the previous night
due to insufficient battery storage capacity to sustain power throughout
the night.

This proof captures real-world operational constraints faced by small-scale,
off-grid and semi-off-grid systems, where energy availability is governed
by physical limits rather than abstraction.

Observed details:
- Activity: Solar inverter power-on
- System: Hybrid solar inverter connected to solar panels
- Reason for prior shutdown: Limited battery capacity
- Time recorded: 07:45 AM
- Date: 2025-12-31
- Context: Household electricity use under energy constraints

This record preserves an authentic operational decision made under
resource limitations, contributing to a verifiable chain of
energy-use evidence within the DGCP framework.

Location: MaMeeFarm™, Thailand  
System: DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof)

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
